name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"ccfff3b1-8500-4d58-a428-eef7d8c20045","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: to_uri","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"89bef099-f29e-4ce4-8689-451357534a6a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"to_uri","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function generates a normalized FASTEN URI for internal code elements such as modules, namespaces, classes, or functions. It ensures that all internal entities are represented using a consistent and FASTEN-compliant identifier format.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6bb54a85-5879-4a06-9d81-f15acaa1cf73","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This function also enforces naming correctness by validating the relationship between a module and its contained namespaces, preventing malformed or ambiguous URIs from being generated.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"eb0934b3-396e-401b-a46d-dcdcb125a175","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"8838afc5-73e1-4f9b-8118-79a836e5ce24","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The primary purpose of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"to_uri","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is to provide a single, canonical way to reference internal Python code elements throughout the FASTEN output. These URIs are later used as keys in module definitions, namespace maps, class hierarchies, and call graphs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e3d573d6-df39-4d89-982c-46c5d19ec88d","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"a8f829bb-c3a0-4620-930c-1b3b09bdad3a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed Behavior","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a2741204-8eda-46c1-9c42-99980363f1f9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When invoked, the function performs the following steps:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"30199c58-7228-415a-a916-83bca1e23df8","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Accepts a module name (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"modname","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and an optional fully qualified name (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":")","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ca383484-ef04-4d0f-9448-d078e5a3cfa6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If a name is provided:","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"867b0607-eb3d-4821-9232-ef56f71584ca","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Treats the name as the module itself when both values are identical","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9c9c8513-539d-4d1c-9853-02d2e3f7cd62","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Validates that the name starts with the module prefix, enforcing proper scoping","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"655a0970-28d3-4a98-8fcd-7206460aee0c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Removes the module prefix to create a relative namespace path","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"620a370d-6a92-4914-8555-9a3ba6fdb7e2","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Normalizes the module name by replacing hyphens with underscores","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fcecf13e-e537-4399-968b-7a8b40487c2c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Checks whether the name corresponds to a known function and appends a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" suffix if applicable","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ea1c813f-8335-40ca-924a-62d341ad61f2","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Constructs and returns a FASTEN-formatted internal URI","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ca0433cf-bbef-4866-961a-f1e624678ee3","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"bcff248e-4d4a-4965-bd66-7342ca33a2c2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"URI Structure","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bbe7f05c-466f-4ddd-b263-e71ab6b405e8","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The generated URI follows this general pattern:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e97ca95a-0706-46c9-93db-2b30221b1a1f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Modules:

","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"/module_name/","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d0d7bd56-b80d-4073-b82d-fb7855d7d22d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Namespaces or classes:

","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"/module_name/relative.namespace","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d81fcb7e-110a-47bb-9655-e5c981a1eccc","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Functions:

","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"/module_name/relative.namespace()","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b278b993-19aa-4423-ba7d-43a6d3da90f6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This structure allows FASTEN consumers to distinguish between different kinds of code entities using a single identifier format.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6edd687f-cce0-4742-b0ac-5d74f78682b9","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"139b1482-305f-4eca-8337-8c046d405a10","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in FASTEN Generation","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"df5ca2c0-c71f-4ff7-8a63-134a5be8f412","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"to_uri","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a core building block used throughout the formatter. Its output is relied upon by module construction, namespace mapping, class hierarchy resolution, and call graph generation, making it critical for consistency and correctness.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e788e417-c870-4c45-b540-b40770545cb9","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"e7767d41-a84b-4c28-b408-04e7c76d7533","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Considerations","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"44f4e577-cb19-4bd5-9880-8806e60fd4e2","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Enforces strict module–namespace relationships to avoid invalid identifiers","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5fba8fd9-ba09-42e0-8d5b-ff7bc0a6bc22","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Keeps URI generation logic centralized and reusable","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"63ab93f4-7b05-4d71-843b-bac58e96939c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Supports function-level granularity without requiring separate handling logic","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"739a252d-79ec-4a2b-93a5-ce50added176","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ensures compatibility with FASTEN naming conventions","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0b3303f3-a060-4ef8-b3d5-3da0f7023b0d","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"0d507219-95df-4682-8bbf-d43bfb2caa82","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
